description-en_US-print:
Plug the Logitech X-530 into your PC, music player, DVD player, or even your PlayStation® or Xbox® game console* and immerse yourself in clean, crisp, consistent surround sound from your games, movies, and more. The high-tech subwoofer adjusts itself dynamically to deliver distortion-free bass. And the five wall-mountable satellite speakers use Logitech´s patented FDD2™ technology to eliminate the uneven sound response created by conventional dual-driver designs. The result: a clear, uniform sound field without the "hot spots" and inconsistency of other dual-driver satellites.

-Frequency Directed Dual Driver (FDD2) satellite technology produces a uniform sound field for full, rich sound. 
-Matching front & rear satellites deliver balanced surround sound 
-Dedicated center channel makes dialogue clear and intelligible. 
-Dynamic, real-time bass equalization maximizes bass response while minimizing distortion. 
-Ported subwoofer design displaces more air for deeper bass. 
-Headphone jack enables private listening. 
-Master volume and subwoofer level controls placed for quick, convenient access. 
-Satellite speaker stands rotate for easy wall mounting.
name: Logitech X-530 Speakers 5.1 UK

description-en_US-print:
Ultra-portable audio upgrade for your notebook

Upgrade the audio on your laptop with the ultra-portable Logitech V10 Notebook Speakers. The handy USB port provides power and digital quality audio with no other cables necessary and the matched quad microdrivers deliver outstanding audio in a lightweight, portable design. The conveniently located controls provide quick and easy access for adjusting the volume level. An included protective travel bag helps organise your cables and speakers and is great for packing away when travelling. Comes with a full product support.

- USB provides power and digital quality audio with no other cables or power necessary.
- Lightweight for maximum portability
- Matched quad micro drivers effortlessly deliver clear smooth audio
- Easily change the volume level with conveniently located controls
- Travel bag organises your cables and speakers
name: Logitech V10 Notebook Speakers

description-en_US-print:
Enjoy your music around the home or on the go.

Compact and highly portable, Logitech's mm32 Portable Speakers are the perfect travel companion for your iPod™ or other MP3 player. These high-performance speakers utilize matching twin neodymium micro drivers for clear audio. A deluxe travel case holds your cables, AC adapter, and speakers neatly. The mm32 includes a unique cradle design that holds your iPod cables for charging and syncing. Speakers can be powered by either the included AC adapter or by four 'AA' batteries.

- Take the speakers with you, using the travel case. Metal grilles protect your speakers while traveling. 
- Charge and sync your iPod in the mm32's unique pass-through cradle; fits all iPods, including iPod nano and iPod with video. 
- Optimize your sound. Quad micro-driver design delivers crystal-clear audio. 
- Listen for hours while traveling. Get up to 10 hours of battery life with four AA batteries (not included).
name: Logitech MM32 Portable Speakers for iPod

description-en_US-print:
Improve the quality of multimedia presentations, online training / Web casts, music listening, gaming, and DVD playback on your system with the Dell™ Internal Speakers. These Internal Speakers fit internally in your system, saving ample space on your office-desk. This product has been tested and validated on Dell systems to ensure it will work with your computer. It is supported by Dell Technical Support when used with a Dell system.

- Delivers 1-Watt output for enhanced multimedia experience
- This product has been tested and validated on Dell systems to ensure it will work with your computer
-  Supported by Dell Technical Support when used with a Dell system

Améliore la qualité sonore de votre ordinateur portable et crée un bureau élégant et organisé. Conception ingénieuse utilisant des aimants intégrés pour convertir le jeu d'enceintes en un seul équipement, de manière simple et rapide. Alimenté par le port USB. Aucun bloc d'alimentation nécessaire, afin que vous puissiez l'utiliser où bon vous semble. Opérationnel dès son branchement, aucun pilote nécessaire. Commande d'alimentation et réglage du volume.

Improves the sound quality of your notebook and creates a nice and clean looking desk. Smart design with integrated magnets to quickly and simply convert the speaker set to one unit. USB powered, no power adapter needed to use it anywhere you like. Just plug-in & start listening, no driver needed. Controls for power and volume adjustment.

description-en_US-print: The new stylish and elegant SOUNDSYSTEM DS P2100 Tube has been added to our multimedia portfolio. Taking inspiration from a hi-fi sound bar, the P2100 Tube presents you with living room design art pieces for acoustic enjoyment. The small & robust satellite speaker is decorated with a deluxe piano finish and the aluminum tube is adorned with a fine print of an exotic motif at its base - a final touch to complete this fantastic artwork. Highlights Tiny & Powerful: Powerful aluminum SOUND TUB E woofer  gives you the 22 Watts powerful bass without any compromise. With avant-garde golf-ballsize satellite speaker design, the overall acoustic performance takes you beyond the imagination! Smart EIDC (Electrical Intelligent Distortion Control) With the cutting-edge microchip controller, the speaker will automatically adjusts the amplifier to ensure extremely low distortion, which will protect the hearing and avoid speaker damage. Auto Fade-in&out Volume Control Designed to enhance audio experience with the new convenient volume control- Fade-in & Fade-out audio effect helps to smoothe every single music note. Plug & Play Easy Plug & Play design provides you the maximum simplicity with any Notebook, PC, and MP3 Music Player.
description-de_DE-print: Dynamische Akustikröhre für Ihr Wohnzimmer Das moderne und elegante SOUNDSYSTEM DS P2100 Tube ist das neue Highlight in unserem Multimedia-Angebot. Das Design des P2100 Tube orientiert sich an Hi-Fi-Geräten im Soundbar-Format. Genießen Sie die hervorragenden Akustikeigenschaften dieses edlen Accessoires für Ihr Wohnzimmer. Der kleine aber robuste Satellitenlautsprecher wurde mit einer Hochglanzoptik veredelt, während die Aluminiumröhre am Fuß mit einem feinen exotischen Motiv verziert ist. Diese Details machen das Gerät zu einem optischen Meisterwerk. Highlights Klein & leistungsstark: Mit dem leistungsstarken  SOUND TUBE Woofer aus Aluminium erhalten Sie einen fetten 22-Watt-Bass ohne Kompromisse. Die akustische Gesamtleistung der avantgardistischen Satellitenlautsprecher im Golfballdesign übertrifft Ihre kühnsten Vorstellungen! Intelligente EIDC (Electrical Intelligent Distortion Control) Über den fortschrittlichen Mikrochip-Controller steuert der Lautsprecher automatisch den Verstärker, um eine extrem geringe Verzerrung sicherzustellen und somit das Hörvermögen zu schützen sowie Schäden an den Lautsprechern zu vermeiden. Lautstärkeregelung mit Auto Fade-in & Fade-out-Funktion Mit der neuen auf absoluten Hörgenuss ausgelegten Lautstärkeregelung und dem Fade-in- & Fade-out-Effekt erhält jede Musiknote brillante Klangqualität. Plug-and-Play Problemloser Einsatz mit jedem Notebook, PC und MP3-Musik-Player dank des einfachen Plug & Play-Designs.
name: Fujitsu DS P2100

description-en_US-print: The SOUNDSYSTEM DS2100 is a new 2.1 speaker system with outstanding acoustic features, which stands for crystal-clear, powerful sound, combined with an attractive and modern design. It consists of two high-quality satellite speakers and a very powerful subwoofer with a total output of 200 W (PMPO). With its small and stylish satellites the SOUNDSYSTEM DS2100 fits conveniently on each desk. Since volume control, mute control and headphone jack are located ergonomically on a satellite speaker, it is possible to place the subwoofer under the desk.
description-de_DE-print: Das SOUNDSYSTEM DS2100 ist ein neues 2.1 Lautsprechersystem mit außerordentlichen Akkustik Features - kristallklarer, leistungsstarker Sound verpackt in einem attraktiven Design. Das System besteht aus 2 hochwertigen Satelliten Lausprecher und einem kraftvollen Subwoofer mit iner Ausgangsleistung von 200 Watt. Mit seinen schlanken Satelliten ist das SOUNDSYSTEM DS2100 für jeden Schreibtisch geeignet. Da die gesamte Bedienung über die Satelitten erfolgt, kann der Subwoofer unter dem Schreibtisch platziert werden.
name: Fujitsu SOUNDSYSTEM DS2100

Rich, clear sound 5 watts of total power means you get strong stereo sound from these speakers. Easy setup Just connect the speakers to your laptop with a standard 3.5 mm plug and you’re ready to go. Your way A headphone jack and convenient volume controls let you. Rich stereo sound With five watts of total power, you get sound that’s clear and strong. Easy to control It’s a snap to get the sound you want with simple volume and power controls. Built-in headphone jack Plug in your headphones and listen to your music, movies and games where and when you want to. Simple setup Just connect the speakers to your laptop with a standard 3.5 mm plug and you’re ready to go.

Headphone jack You can listen to your favorite tracks, play games, and watch videos in private.

description-en_US-print: Enjoy rich, full sound, edgy design, and convenient controls. The Logitech® S-120™ speaker system is the perfect audio companion to your PC or notebook. Features: - 2.0 stereo speaker system - New design with metal grille (all-matte finish) - Satellite base designed for greater stability on the desktop - Integrated power and volume control - 3.5mm headphone jack included - Improved acoustics with 2.3 watts RMS output
name: Logitech S120

description-en_US-print: Hear crystal-clear sounds with the Odeon Sound System. Odeon is the name of an ancient opera theater designed for sound resonance letting the voice of opera singers reverberate throughout the structure. The S-260 makes such an effect possible with its unique enclosure design and by tilting the speaker units 30 degrees. The compact and minimal design fits well with contemporary devices. Its soft touch, rubber coating finish, and small size makes it easy to carry around with your laptop.
description-en_US-mobile: 2.0 Speakers, USB, Regularity power/Maximum power: 2W / 4W, 85Hz - 20kHz, 4Ohm, white
name: Samsung S-260

description-en_US-print: The X-540 speakers use FDD2™ (Frequency Directed Dual Driver) technology to produce a uniform soundfield anywhere in the room. Immerse yourself in the game using the selectable 'matrix mode,' which automatically creates 5.1 surround sound from common 2-channel stereo sources. The compact satellites are wall-mountable, and and a special clip lets you place the centre channel speaker on top of most flat-panel monitors to reduce desktop clutter. Use the wired control centre to control volume and bass levels or connect headphones to enjoy your games and music privately. Frequency Directed Dual Driver technology FDD2 eliminates uneven response created by conventional dual-driver designs. Matrix mode Creates 5.1 surround-sound effect from 2-channel stereo sources. Innovative centre channel LCD clip Speaker attaches to the top of most flat-panel monitors. Satellite speaker stands Rotate for easy wall-mounting and positioning. Dynamic, real-time bass equalisation Maximises low-frequency response at all volumes. High-excursion, ported, down-firing subwoofer Displaces more air for deeper bass.
name: Logitech X-540, 5.1 surround-sound

description-en_US-print: See it. Touch it. Hear it. With built-in touch-sensitive multimedia controls and a backlighted display that shows digital-music track information, a clock, volume and more, these trophy speakers are meant to be touched and seen. Perfect for use with either a desktop or notebook PC, the powerful speakers deliver rich audio without using a separate space-consuming subwoofer. The bi-amp design, 25.4 mm dome tweeters and 76 mm high-excursion woofers deliver studio-quality sound that fills a room. Touch-sensitive multimedia controls For greater command of commonly used functions such as Volume, Bass, Treble, Play, Pause, Next, and Previous. Digital-music track information The graphic LCD shows track information such as artist and song title, total and elapsed time, and other useful information from your PC. Internet radio presets Four convenient presets let you quickly save and recall your favourite Internet radio stations and playlists. Studio-quality audio A 30 W RMS two-way speaker design delivers the clear highs and incredible lows. The digital crossover EQ ensures natural, balanced sound. Convenient connectivity Plug in headphones for private listening or connect your favourite MP3 or CD player to the auxiliary input. Simple setup The included USB cable carries both audio and track information from your PC, for a simple, no-hassle installation.
name: Logitech Z-10 Interactive Speaker System

description-de_DE-print:
-Hochwertige Stereo-Lautsprecher für Ihren iPod mit drahtloser Fernbedienung, 30 Watt RMS-Ausgangsleistung und Ladefunktion.
-Leistungsstarke Neodymium-Treibertechnologie und Bassreflex-Design bietet eine außergewöhnlich hohe Klangqualität mit eindrucksvoller Basswiedergabe.
-Konzipiert für den iPod: Stecken Sie einfach Ihren iPod in den integrierten Docking-Anschluss und genießen Sie den Sound!
-Lehnen Sie sich zurück und entspannen Sie sich - Sie haben alles auf Ihrem iPod im Griff mit Ihrer drahtlosen Fernbedienung.
-Die Dockingstation verfügt über einen kombinierten Ein-/Ausschalter-Lautstärkeregler und kann auch zum Aufladen der Batterie Ihres iPod verwendet werden.
-Im Lieferumfang enthalten sind verschiedene Adapter für alle gängigen iPod-Modelle (iPod Video/Photo/Nano/Mini/U2 oder iPods der 3./4. Generation).
-Auch geeignet für den iPod Shuffle und alle anderen MP3-Player mit 3,5 mm-Stereoausgang.
name: Trust Sound Station for iPod SP-2992Wi

description-fr_FR-print: Ensemble d'enceintes stéréo compactes avec sortie de 5 W RMS. Reproduction fidèle des effets sonores et de la musique. Commande d'alimentation et réglage du volume. Connexion casque à l'avant. Alimentation USB : prise murale inutile.
description-fr_FR-mobile: Ensemble d'enceintes stéréo compactes avec sortie de 5 W RMS
description-en_US-print: Compact stereo speaker set with 5 Watt RMS output. For clear reproduction of sound effects and music. Controls for power and volume adjustment. Front side headphone connection. USB powered - no wall power needed.
description-en_US-mobile: Compact stereo speaker set with 5 Watt RMS output
description-de_DE-print: Stereo-Lautsprecherset in kompakter Ausführung mit einer Ausgangsleistung von 5 Watt RMS. Klare Wiedergabe von Klangeffekten und Musik. Leistungs- und Lautstärkeregler. Kopfhöreranschluss an der Frontseite. USB-Betrieb – kein Netzanschluss erforderlich.
description-de_DE-mobile: Stereo-Lautsprecherset in kompakter Ausführung mit einer Ausgangsleistung von 5 Watt RMS
name: Trust SP-2200

description-de_DE-print:
-Lautsprecherset für den iPod in hochwertigem Design mit einer Ausgangsleistung von 12 Watt und Dockingstation-Funktionalität.
-Konzipiert für den iPod: Einfach den iPod (Angaben zu den einzelnen Modellen siehe Übersicht) an den integrierten Dockinganschluss anschließen, und schon kann die Soundwiedergabe beginnen.
-3 Zoll Neodym-Mikrotreiber für außergewöhnlich hohe Soundqualität mit beeindruckender Basswiedergabe.
-Komplette Dockingstation-Funktionalität: Musikwiedergabe, Aufladen des iPod und Funktion zum Herunterladen von Dateien vom PC oder Notebook ohne Anschließen/Trennen von Kabeln.
-Einfach an der Vorderseite zugängliche Tasten für die Lautstärkeregelung und Ein-/Ausschalter.
-Auch geeignet für den iPod Shuffle und alle anderen MP3-Player mit 3,5 mm-Stereoausgang.
name: Trust Sound Station for iPod SP-2990Bi

description-de_DE-print:
-Lautsprecherset für den iPod in hochwertigem Design mit einer Ausgangsleistung von 12 Watt und Dockingstation-Funktionalität.
-Konzipiert für den iPod: Einfach den iPod (Angaben zu den einzelnen Modellen siehe Übersicht) an den integrierten Dockinganschluss anschließen, und schon kann die Soundwiedergabe beginnen.

-Komplette Dockingstation-Funktionalität: Musikwiedergabe, Aufladen des iPod und Funktion zum Herunterladen von Dateien vom PC oder Notebook ohne Anschließen/Trennen von Kabeln.

description-de_DE-print:
-Leistungsstarke und hochwertige Stereolautsprecher für den iPod mit drahtloser Fernbedienung, einer Ausgabeleistung von 40 Watt RMS, Videoausgang und Ladefunktion.
-Neodym-Basstreiber und -Hochtonlautsprecher für außergewöhnlich hohe Soundqualität mit vollem Frequenzbereich und beeindruckender Basswiedergabe.
-Konzipiert für den iPod: Einfach den iPod an den integrierten Dockinganschluss anschließen, und schon kann die Soundwiedergabe beginnen.
-Lehnen Sie sich zurück, und entspannen Sie sich. – Sie haben alles auf dem iPod im Griff mit der drahtlosen Fernbedienung.
-Die Dockingstation ist ausgestattet mit benutzerfreundlichen Reglern für Lautstärke, Stummschaltung und Standby und kann auch zum Aufladen des iPod-Akkus eingesetzt werden.
-Kann auch als tragbares Gerät verwendet werden. Ideal für den Gebrauch in allen Wohnräumen, im Auto, am Strand usw.
-Ausgestattet mit S-Video- und Composite-Videoausgang zur Wiedergabe von Videos oder zum Anzeigen von Bildern mit dem Fernsehgerät oder Projektor.
-Unterstützt alle gängigen iPod-Modelle mit Dockinganschluss ( Angaben zu den einzelnen Modellen siehe Übersicht).
-Auch geeignet für den iPod Shuffle und alle anderen MP3-Player mit 3,5-mm-Stereoausgang.
name: Trust Sound Station for iPod SP-2996Wi

description-de_DE-print:
-2-Wege-Lautsprecherset in schmaler Ausführung mit Lautstärkeregelung und einer Ausgangsleistung von 10 Watt RMS.
-Verstellbarer Ständer für optimale Hörposition und zur einfachen Wandmontage.
-Neodym-Mikrotreiber mit 2-Wege-System für außergewöhnlich hohe Klangqualität.
-Einfach an der Seite zugänglicher Anschluss für den Kopfhörer.
-Automatische Stummschaltung beim Anschließen des Kopfhörers.
name: Trust 2.0 Speaker Set SP-2650D

description-fr_FR-print: Son sans fil Libérez votre musique. Vous pouvez placer votre haut-parleur où vous voulez dans un rayon de 15 m* autour de votre ordinateur portable, votre iPad ou votre iPhone. Son stéréo riche Les deux transducteurs de 5 cm et les graves en quantité impressionnante vous permettent d'entendre clairement et distinctement votre musique même à travers la pièce. Ca veut dire quoi? En savoir plus sur la terminologie audio et sur ce que cela implique pour vous. En savoir plus. Piles rechargeables d'une autonomie de dix heures Vous pouvez augmenter votre temps d'écoute sans surprise grâce aux piles rechargeables d'une autonomie de 10 heures** et au témoin de charge des piles. Configuration simplifiée Soyez opérationnel en quelques secondes sans aucun câblage ni logiciel. Branchez l'adaptateur sans fil fourni dans un port USB ou couplez facilement votre haut-parleur avec votre iPad ou votre iPhone. Conception portable Ce haut-parleur compact ne prend pas beaucoup de place sur votre bureau, votre étagère ou dans votre sacoche d'ordinateur portable. Etui de transport souple Votre haut-parleur et le bloc d'alimentation se rangent facilement dans l'étui de transport. Entrée auxiliaire Une prise stéréo standard 3,5 mm décuple les possibilités musicales et permet de connecter un ordinateur ou un lecteur de musique portable.
description-en_US-print: Wireless audio Unchain your music. You can place your speaker wherever you want—up to 50 feet (15 m)* away from your laptop, iPad or iPhone. Rich, full stereo sound Dual two-inch drivers and plenty of bass let you hear your music loud and clear—even from across the room. Watt? Learn more about audio terminology and what it means for you. Learn more. 10-hour rechargeable battery You can listen longer without surprises thanks to the 10-hour** rechargeable battery and battery-life indicator light. Simple setup You’ll be up and running in seconds with no wires or software. Either plug the included wireless adapter into a USB port, or easily pair your speaker with your iPad or iPhone. Portable design This compact speaker doesn’t take up much room on your desk or bookshelf—or in your laptop bag. Soft travel case Your speaker and power supply pack neatly into the bag for travel. Auxiliary input A standard 3.5 mm stereo jack opens up your music possibilities to just about any portable music player or computer.
description-de_DE-print: Kabelloser Sound Lassen Sie Ihrer Musik freien Lauf. Sie können den Lautsprecher überall aufstellen – in einem Umkreis von bis zu 15 Metern* von Ihrem Notebook, iPad oder iPhone. Satter und voller Stereoklang Mit zwei 5,1-cm-Antriebsspulen und viel Bass klingt Ihre Musik laut und klar – selbst vom anderen Ende des Raums aus. Wissen Sie, was „Watt“ bedeutet? Informieren Sie sich über die Terminologie zu Audiogeräten, um die richtige Wahl zu treffen. Erfahren Sie mehr. Akku mit bis zu 10 Stunden Laufzeit Der Akku sorgt mit einer Laufzeit von bis zu 10 Stunden** für einen längeren ungestörten Musikgenuss und mit der Batteriestandsanzeige im Blick bleiben Ihnen unangenehme Überraschungen erspart. Einfaches Einrichten Ihr Lautsprecher ist innerhalb von Sekunden einsatzbereit – ganz ohne Kabel oder Software. Schließen Sie den beigefügten kabellosen Adapter einfach an einen USB-Port an oder pairen Sie den Lautsprecher mit Ihrem iPad oder iPhone. Tragbares Design Dieser kompakte Lautsprecher nimmt nicht viel Platz auf Ihrem Schreibtisch oder im Bücherregal ein – oder in Ihrer Notebooktasche. Weiches Reise-Etui Lautsprecher und Netzteil finden genug Platz im Reise-Etui. AUX-Eingang Über einen 3,5-mm-Stereoanschluss lassen sich alle tragbaren Audiogeräte oder Computer anschließen.
name: Logitech Wireless Speaker Z515

description-fr_FR-print: Son riche à 360 degrés Votre haut-parleur projette le son de manière égale dans toutes les directions pour vous faire profiter d'un son riche et clair dans toute la pièce. Prêt à l'emploi La connexion USB assure la mise sous tension et fournit instantanément un son numérique pur à partir d'un simple câble, sans logiciel ou alimentation externe. Fixation à clip simple Le haut-parleur se fixe solidement à la plupart des ordinateurs portables et des netbooks pour vous accompagner dans toutes les conditions (au bureau, au lit, à l'aéroport, etc.). Câble rétractable Le câble USB s'enroule à l'arrière du haut-parleur pour désencombrer votre espace de travail. Etui de transport Un étui permet de protéger votre haut-parleur lorsqu'il est dans votre sac ou dans votre sacoche. Entrée auxiliaire Une prise stéréo standard 3,5 mm décuple les possibilités musicales et permet de connecter un ordinateur ou un lecteur de musique portable. Conception portable Ce haut-parleur compact ne prend pas beaucoup de place sur votre bureau, votre étagère ou dans votre sacoche d'ordinateur portable.
description-en_US-print: Room-filling, 360-degree sound Your speaker projects sound more evenly in all directions, so you enjoy rich, clear sound from any angle throughout the room. Plug and play The USB connection delivers power and pure, digital audio from a single cord—without the need for software or an external power supply. Simple, clip-on design Your speaker attaches securely to most laptops and netbooks, so you can easily use it anywhere you use your computer—your office, your bed, the airport and more. Storable cord The USB cable tucks neatly into the back of your speaker, giving you a look that’s sleek and clutter-free. Travel case Your speaker stays protected while inside your bag or briefcase. Auxiliary input A standard 3.5 mm stereo jack opens up your music possibilities to just about any portable music player or computer. Portable design This compact speaker doesn’t take up much room on your desk or bookshelf—or in your laptop bag.
description-de_DE-print: Raumfüllender Rundumklang Ihr Lautsprecher gibt den Ton gleichmäßig in alle Richtungen ab, sodass Sie einen vollen, klaren Sound in jedem Winkel des Raums erleben. Plug&Play Ein einzelnes USB-Kabel liefert Strom und reines, digitales Audiovergnügen – ganz ohne Software und externe Stromversorgung. Leichtes Clip-on-Design Der Lautsprecher lässt sich sicher an den meisten Note- und Netbooks befestigen, damit Sie ihn überall dort einsetzen können, wo Sie Ihren Computer benutzen: im Büro, im Bett, auf dem Flughafen usw. Verstaubares Kabel Das USB-Kabel lässt sich leicht in der Rückseite des Lautsprechers verstauen – für einen eleganten Look ohne lästige Kabel. Reise-Etui Ihr Lautsprecher ist beim Transport in der Tasche oder Aktenmappe geschützt. AUX-Eingang Über einen 3,5-mm-Stereoanschluss lassen sich alle tragbaren Audiogeräte oder Computer anschließen. Tragbares Design Dieser kompakte Lautsprecher nimmt nicht viel Platz auf Ihrem Schreibtisch oder im Bücherregal ein – oder in Ihrer Notebooktasche.
name: Logitech Laptop Speaker Z305

description-en_US-print: We've taken the award-winning Logitech Z-680 speaker system and made it even better. How? By improving everything from the subwoofer to the satellites and adding new innovations like real-time digital sound equalization. The result is the Logitech Z-5500 Digital, a THX-certified, 500-watt 5.1 surround sound speaker system that offers everything you could possibly want… and some things you didn't even know you needed. And once you plug in your PC, DVD or music player, or video game console, you'll never want to listen to anything else. - Powerful, distortion-free bass: The new, larger 10-inch long-throw subwoofer driver with flared bass port delivers 188 watts of thunderous bass. - Innovative driver technology: Polished aluminum phase-plug satellites combine two drivers into one--the clarity of a tweeter with the richness and fullness of a separate mid-range. - Digital equalization: The Z-5500 Digital actively adjusts frequency response in real time for the cleanest, most accurate sound reproduction. - DTS® 96/24 support: Enjoy studio-quality sound thanks to the Z-5500's support for 96 kHz / 24-bit digital audio streams - Amazingly powerful controls: The Digital SoundTouch™ Control Center lets you control volume to all speakers, set inputs, and much more. And the separate wireless remote is great for home theaters and video game consoles. - Innovative satellite design: Cloth grilles are removable for a pro-audio look. Pedestals rotate for easy wall mounting or desk placement. Center channel can be mounted on wall, above or below monitor. - Connect to multiple sources: Simultaneously connect 6 audio sources including PCs, video game consoles, and DVD, CD & portable music players… and control it all from the Digital SoundTouch™ Control Center. Digital SoundTouch™ Control Center - Digital LCD: Clear, crisp high contrast display - Input: Select audio source (optical, coax, or direct) - Effect: Select digital surround sound effect - Settings: Adjust parameters of digital surround sound effects - Mute: Mute the entire system - Level: Adjust volume, subwoofer, center, and fader levels - Pro-audio style knob: Oversized, weighted control knob with digital precision - System Power - Auxiliary input jack: For convenient connection to portable audio devices (CD, MP3, MiniDisc®, etc.) Dolby® Digital is the universal standard for 5.1 digital sound. DVDs, PlayStation®2, Xbox®, digital cable, satellite TV, and HDTV all use Dolby Digital. The Z-5500 Digital includes a hardware Dolby Digital decoder for full, rich 5.1 sound. THX® certification is the "seal of approval" for speaker quality. It is an absolute assurance that these speakers accurately recreate the full sonic experience of a movie theater. The Z-5500 Digital is one of a select few speaker systems that meets the rigid standards for unparalleled THX-quality sound. DTS® Digital Surround delivers 5.1 digital sound that rivals master soundtracks. DTS soundtracks are included in many DVD videos, DVD Audio discs, and PlayStation®2 games. The Z-5500 Digital includes a hardware DTS decoder for master-quality sound. The Z-5500 Digital also includes support for DTS 96/24, an enhanced, higher-resolution, studio-quality format available on many DVD video and DVD Audio discs. Package Contents Speakers: - 4 satellites - 1 center channel - 1 subwoofer 6-channel direct cable Digital SoundTouch™ control center Wireless remote control, batteries included * User´s manual
description-en_US-mobile: Z-5500 Digital, a THX-certified, 500-watt 5.1 surround sound speaker system
name: Logitech Z-5500 Digital

description-en_US-print:
Eliminate the hassle of hiding speaker wires! Immerse yourself in clutter-free, high-fidelity digital surround sound with Logitech´s THX-certified, 315-watt Z-5450 Digital 5.1 speaker system with digital hardware decoder and dual wireless rear speakers. The Digital SoundTouch Control Center supports Dolby Digital and DTS soundtracks, and includes digital and analog inputs for connecting DVD players, PCs, video game consoles, MP3 players, and more. Fine-tune your listening experience with a convenient wireless remote. Wall-mountable satellites help make installation easy in any room. The patented dual-chamber subwoofer enhances your games, music, and movies with thundering distortion-free bass.

- Eliminate the clutter of rear speaker wires!  The Logitech Z-5450 digital speaker package includes dual wireless rear speakers for simple, clutter-free installation. Satellite speaker stands rotate for easy wall mounting. 
- Listen to crystal-clear, high-quality audio through rear speaker adaptive channel hopping with redundant transmissions. 
Experience earth-shaking bass. 310-watt RMS delivers thunderous power. Patented dual-chamber subwoofer plays louder and goes lower for unbelievable bass. 
- Experience the full sonic experience of a movie theater. The THX certification guarantees high-quality audio. And the Z-5450 Digital speakers include a hardware DTS® decoder for master-quality sound as well as support for DTS® 96/24, an enhanced, higher-resolution, studio-quality format available on many DVD video and DVD Audio discs. 
- Enjoy smoother frequency response. Advanced aluminum phase plug drivers are further enhanced by a Digital EQ. The Logitech Z-5450 Digital Speakers include Dolby® Pro Logic II decoding for surround-sound playback from 2-channel analog sources, creating realistic 5.1 surround sound from stereo music, movies and games. Digital equalization actively adjusts frequency response in real time for the cleanest, most accurate sound reproduction. 
- View and change the effects settings, adjust or mute the volume, decode Dolby Digital, and use the auxiliary input jack for connecting your iPod or MP3 player--all wirelessly--with the compact Digital SoundTouch Control Center.
name: Logitech Z-5450 Digital 5.1 Speaker System

description-fr_FR-print: Boostez les performances audio de votre PC et de votre lecteur CD ou MP3 avec l'ensemble de haut-parleurs X-210 de Logitech. Les haut-parleurs satellites élégants et compacts avec transducteurs haute excursion offrent un son riche et plein. La conception du subwoofer est dotée d'un égalisateur dynamique temps réel qui accroît la réponse des graves tout en réduisant les effets de distorsion. Il brasse également plus d'air pour produire des graves plus profonds. Le système de haut-parleurs X-210 possède également une télécommande filaire très pratique, avec des commandes de réglage du volume et de marche/arrêt, ainsi qu'une prise casque pour une écoute en solo. Les supports de haut-parleur satellite pivotent pour une meilleure fixation au mur. Prêt à l'emploi: connexion rapide aux ordinateurs, lecteurs de CD et lecteurs MP3.
description-en_US-print: Pump up your PC, CD and MP3 audio with Logitech’s X-210 speaker system. Its sleek compact satellites with high-excursion drivers provide full, rich sound. The ported subwoofer design features dynamic, real-time equalisation that maximises bass response while minimising distortion. It also displaces more air for deeper bass. The X-210 speaker system also has a convenient wired remote with volume and power controls and a headphone jack for private listening. Satellite speaker stands rotate for easy wall mounting. Plug and play connects easily to PCs, CD and MP3 players.
name: Logitech Speakers 2.1 X-210(UK)

description-en_US-print: Leave your old speakers behind and step up to the sleek style and high quality of the Logitech X-220 2.1 speaker system. You'll hear the difference immediately: from the deep bass to the smooth mid-range to the clear highs. You'll also see the difference: The innovative satellites feature wrap-around grilles and rotating stands for easy wall-mounting. And controls for power and volume and a headphone jack for private listening are right at your fingertips. Hook it up to your PC for great games and music. Or use the included video game console adapter to bring your PlayStation®, PlayStation®2, Xbox®, or GameCube™ experience to a new level. \n\n
name: Logitech X220

description-en_US-print: Style... quality... value. That's what you'll get from the Logitech® X-120 speakers. With their sleek shape and stylish look, they're going to look great on your desk. And Logitech's audio specialists have engineered the X-120 for more than great looks. Just plug them in and listen. You won't believe the high, low, and midrange sound quality from these value-priced speakers. \n\n
name: Logitech X120

description-en_US-print: With its brushed aluminium faces and wood grain styling, the Logitech Z-3 speaker system will dress up any workspace, whether it's in your home office, bedroom, or living room. The only thing that's more impressive than the Z-3's great looks is its sound quality. Its two phase plug satellite speakers, which feature removable grilles and durable cast metal stands, deliver crystal clear, room-filling music, dialogue, and sound effects. And thanks to its patented, award-winning pressure driver subwoofer technology, you'll hear all the bass you expect-and depending on how loud you turn up the subwoofer, you'll feel all the bass, too.
description-en_US-mobile: Logitech® Z-3: 2.1 configuration, 40 Watts, Wired Remote
name: Logitech Z-3

description-en_US-print:
Increase your gaming intensity by upgrading to the 6.1 surround sound of Logitech's X-620 speaker system. It features six satellite speakers, including a centre rear channel, plus a powerful pressure driver subwoofer. Are you looking for booming bass? Crisp highs and mid-range? The X-620 delivers. Its patented subwoofer design provides twice the bass of conventional designs for smooth, powerful lows, and the satellite speakers provide rich mid-range and crisp high-end tones. Even if you don't have a 6.1 sound card, you can still enjoy the benefits of all seven speakers by using the source selector switch.
Got a Sony® PlayStation®2, Microsoft® Xbox®, or Nintendo® GameCube™? Just plug in the X-620 using the convenient video game console adapter and immerse yourself in the explosions, music and dialogue of your favourite games.
name: Logitech X-620

description-en_US-print:
Demanding gamers require high power, THX® performance, and true surround sound. The Logitech® Z-5300 delivers on all counts.
Its patented dual chamber subwoofer pounds out twice the bass of conventional designs to deliver deep, loud and powerful bass. Polished aluminium phase plug satellite drivers project superb high-end and rich mid-range tones for balanced sound. Its full-featured SoundTouch™ wired remote provides convenient controls for quick adjustments. Rotating pedestals allow easy installation on wall or desktop. The Z-5300 also features removable grilles for a high-end, custom look.
Got a Sony® PlayStation®2, Microsoft® Xbox®, or Nintendo® GameCube™? Just plug in the Z-5300 using the convenient video game console adapter and immerse yourself in the explosions, music, and dialogue of your favourite games.
description-en_US-mobile: Logitech® Z-5300: 280 watts, 5.1 Configuration, THX® Certified, Wired Remote
name: Logitech Z-5300

description-en_US-print:
Stereo Multimedia Speaker System
• Desktop PC/Notebook users who want authentic 
stereo sound for music, Internet and general PC applications, but at a very 
affordable price level.
• Users who don’t want to spend much on a PC sound solution, but who want a 
brand name they can trust for quality audio, quality products and good 
after-sales support.
• Portable CD/MP3 player users looking for compact speakers to be able to share 
their music 
• Active 3 Watts RMS stereo speaker system
• Bass reflex system gives class leading bass performance
• Headphone connection
• Magnetically shielded to prevent distortion of the monitor
name: Philips 2.0 3W 2PCS SPEAKER SYSTEM

description-en_US-print:
The incredible bass and enveloping experience of a home audio system is now available on the go. The Logitech mm50 Portable Speakers for iPod uses 3" pressure drivers to maximize bass and minimize distortion. The rechargeable Li-ion batteries last up to 10 hours, and you can charge both the speaker system and iPod battery simultaneously. Using 3-D sound processing that "widens" the stereo effect, this system's sound seems to come from an area about two feet wider than the speaker itself. And with a custom travel case, you can take the big sound from this small package anywhere.
Optimize your sound. “3D Stereo" technology dramatically widens the stereo image, creating an enveloping audio experience. 
Full, balanced audio. Max-X™ high-excursion drivers with neodymium magnets provide remarkable sound quality.
Plug and Play. Connects easily to your iPod or iPod mini. 
Listen to music wherever you are. Operates with AC adapter (included) or rechargeable Li-ion batteries. AC adapter charges speaker and iPod batteries simultaneously.
name: Logitech mm50 Portable Speakers 5V white

description-en_US-print: Logitech’s X-140 stereo speakers have the quality and innovation you expect from Logitech. The innovative two-driver acoustic design provides enhanced bass in a slim profile. Dynamic, real-time bass equalization maximises bass reponse while minimising distortion. Connect your portable MP3 or CD player to the convenient 3.5mm auxiliary input. Customize your audio balance with easy-to-reach tone and volume controls. Connect your favorite headphones to the integrated headphone jack and enjoy your music privately.
name: Logitech X-140 Speakers (UK)

description-en_US-print:
The incredible bass and enveloping experience of a home audio system is now available on the go. The Logitech mm50 Portable Speakers for iPod uses 3" pressure drivers to maximize bass and minimize distortion. The rechargeable Li-ion batteries last up to 10 hours, and you can charge both the speaker system and iPod battery simultaneously. Using 3-D sound processing that "widens" the stereo effect, this system's sound seems to come from an area about two feet wider than the speaker itself. description-fr_FR-print: Laissez-vous porter par le rythme de ces haut-parleurs pour ordinateur de bureau qui produisent des graves en quantité impressionnante. Profondeur des graves L'égalisation des graves en temps réel vous fait profiter de graves plus profonds avec une déformation minimale, sans que les haut-parleurs n'encombrent votre espace. Connectivité étendue Vous avez la possibilité de brancher à ces haut-parleurs votre casque et votre lecteur de CD ou de MP3. Exercez un contrôle total Vous pouvez aisément les mettre hors tension, sous tension, ou diminuer les graves à votre guise grâce aux contrôles intégrés.
description-en_US-print: Logitech’s X-140 stereo speakers have the quality and innovation you expect from Logitech. The innovative two-driver acoustic design provides enhanced bass in a slim profile. Dynamic, real-time bass equalization maximises bass reponse while minimising distortion. Connect your portable MP3 or CD player to the convenient 3.5mm auxiliary input. Customize your audio balance with easy-to-reach tone and volume controls. Connect your favorite headphones to the integrated headphone jack and enjoy your music privately.
description-de_DE-print: Der Stereolautsprecher X-140 von Logitech bietet die Qualität und Innovation, die Sie von Logitech erwarten. description-fr_FR-print: Son riche à 360 degrés Votre haut-parleur projette le son de manière égale dans toutes les directions pour vous faire profiter d'un son riche et clair dans toute la pièce. Fixation à clip simple Le haut-parleur se fixe solidement à la plupart des ordinateurs portables et des netbooks pour vous accompagner dans toutes les conditions (au bureau, au lit, à l'aéroport, etc.). Câble rétractable Le câble USB s'enroule à l'arrière du haut-parleur pour désencombrer votre espace de travail. Etui de transport Un étui permet de protéger votre haut-parleur lorsqu'il est dans votre sac ou dans votre sacoche. Entrée auxiliaire Une prise stéréo standard 3,5 mm décuple les possibilités musicales et permet de connecter un ordinateur ou un lecteur de musique portable. Conception portable Ce haut-parleur compact ne prend pas beaucoup de place sur votre bureau, votre étagère ou dans votre sacoche d'ordinateur portable.
description-en_US-print: Room-filling, 360-degree sound Your speaker projects sound more evenly in all directions, so you enjoy rich, clear sound from any angle throughout the room. Plug and play The USB connection delivers power and pure, digital audio from a single cord—without the need for software or an external power supply. Simple, clip-on design Your speaker attaches securely to most laptops and netbooks, so you can easily use it anywhere you use your computer—your office, your bed, the airport and more. Storable cord The USB cable tucks neatly into the back of your speaker, giving you a look that’s sleek and clutter-free. Travel case Your speaker stays protected while inside your bag or briefcase. Auxiliary input A standard 3.5 mm stereo jack opens up your music possibilities to just about any portable music player or computer. Portable design This compact speaker doesn’t take up much room on your desk or bookshelf—or in your laptop bag.
description-de_DE-print: Raumfüllender Rundumklang Ihr Lautsprecher gibt den Ton gleichmäßig in alle Richtungen ab, sodass Sie einen vollen, klaren Sound in jedem Winkel des Raums erleben. description-fr_FR-mobile: Le Sandberg Urban StreetSound 2.0 est un ensemble de haut-parleurs innovant destiné à votre ordinateur portable. La carte son intégrée dans les haut-parleurs ainsi que l’amplification USB garantissent une sensible amélioration sonore par rapport aux haut-parleurs d’origine de votre ordinateur portable. Emportez avec vous les haut-parleurs lors de vos déplacements et vous profiterez partout d’un son excellent.
description-en_US-mobile: The Sandberg Urban StreetSound 2.0 is an innovative speaker set for your laptop. Simply connect the speakers to a USB port – and they are ready in an instant. This leaves your laptop’s audio output free for e.g. a headset. The speakers’ built-in sound card and USB amplification ensure a solid sound upgrade from your laptop’s native speakers. Take the speakers with you on the go and you’ll be ready to rock anywhere.
description-de_DE-mobile: Sandberg Urban StreetSound 2.0 ist ein innovatives Lautsprecherset für Ihren Laptop. Schließen Sie die Lautsprecher einfach an einen USB-Port an und sie sind sofort einsatzbereit. Somit bleibt der Audioausgang Ihres Laptops frei, z.B. für ein Headset. Die eingebaute Karte der Lautsprecher sowie eine USB-Verstärkung sorgen für eine hörbare Verbesserung Ihres Laptop-Sounds verglichen mit den ursprünglichen Lautsprechern. Nehmen Sie die Lautsprecher mit, wenn Sie unterwegs sind, und Sie können überall losrocken.
name: Sandberg Urban StreetSound 2.0

description-fr_FR-print:
Overview
Le haut-parleur portable numérique HP est idéal pour ceux qui souhaitent transporter leur musique et profitez d'un son superbe ultra clair.

Features
• Le haut-parleur portable numérique HP dispose simplement d'une connexion USB pour votre netbook ou ordinateur portable pour maximiser votre expérience audio numérique suprême. Et vous n'avez pas besoin d'un CD d'installation ou d'un pilote logiciel, il vous suffit de le brancher.

• Pourquoi être esclave de vos haut-parleurs ? Profitez de la musique où que vous soyez avec un haut-parleur portable numérique HP. Il est alimenté par USB, pour que vous puissiez l'utiliser où que vous soyez. C'est une barre de haut-parleur, ce qui facilite son transport lors de vos déplacements.

• Ce serait-il pas agréable de toujours avoir votre musique à portée de main et de savoir que vous profiterez d'un son ultra clair et lisse ? Le haut-parleur portable numérique HP est la réponse : il vous suffit de l'emporter dans sa sacoche de voyage protectrice lors de vos déplacements.

• Ne vous encombrez plus la vie avec des câbles. Le haut-parleur portable numérique HP est alimenté par USB pour réduire l'encombrement de câbles et garantir un fonctionnement quand et où vous le souhaitez. Aucun CD d'installation ni pilote logiciel nécessaire ; connectivité « plug and play ».
description-en_US-print:
The HP Digital Portable Speaker is perfect for people who want to be able to carry their music with them and enjoy ultra-clear, superb sound.

The HP Digital Portable Speaker has just one simple USB connection for your netbook or notebook to maximise the ultimate digital audio experience. And you won't need an installation CD or any software drivers - just plug in and play.

Why be tied to your speakers? Enjoy your music wherever you choose with an HP Digital Portable Speaker. It’s USB powered, so you'll have power whenever you need it - and there's a speaker bar which makes it easy to carry when you travel.

Wouldn't it be nice to always have your music around you and know you'll enjoy an ultra-clear, smooth sound? The HP Digital Portable Speaker is the answer - just pack it into its protective travel bag and take it with you when you're on the go.

Don't clutter up your life with cables. The HP Digital Portable Speaker is USB powered to reduce cord clutter and ensure power is available whenever and wherever you need it. No installation CDs or software drivers necessary: just plug in and play.
description-de_DE-print:
Overview
Der tragbare HP Lautsprecher ist die perfekte Lösung für Benutzer, die Ihre Musik stets bei sich tragen und einen klaren, exzellenten Klang genießen möchten.

Features
• Der tragbare HP Digitallautsprecher erfordert nur eine einfache USB-Verbindung zu Ihrem Netbook oder Notebook, um einen optimalen digitalen Sound zu erzielen. Sie benötigen keine Installations-CD und keine Softwaretreiber – einfach einstecken und genießen.

• Warum durch Lautsprecher Flexibilität einbüßen? Genießen Sie mit dem tragbaren HP Digitallautsprecher Ihre Musik, wo immer Sie möchten. Er wird über USB mit Strom versorgt, sodass die Stromversorgung überall sichergestellt ist – und über die Lautsprecherleiste lässt er sich auf Reisen leicht transportieren.

• Wäre es nicht schön, Ihre Musik immer bei sich zu haben und einen klaren, weichen Klang zu genießen? Dann ist der tragbare HP Digitallautsprecher genau das Richtige für Sie – auf Reisen lässt er sich sicher in seiner Schutztasche verpackt transportieren.

• Genießen Sie Bewegungsfreiheit ohne Kabel. Der tragbare Digitallautsprecher von HP wird über USB mit Strom versorgt, um Kabel zu vermeiden und sicherzustellen, dass er bei Bedarf überall und jederzeit mit Strom versorgt wird. Keine Installations-CDs oder Softwaretreiber erforderlich: Einfach anschließen und genießen.
name: HP WN483AA loudspeaker

description-en_US-print: Mobile Tunes Portable Speakers from Targus allow you to listen to music wherever you are; powered by battery, USB or AC adapter ensures you will never be without music. The speakers are compatible with any audio source that has a 3.5mm headphone jack so they can be used with notebook computers, MP3 players or CD players which means they can be used for business presentations, playing music or watching DVDs. Features: - Compatible with any audio player with 3.5mm headphone jack. - Power On/Off & volume control buttons. - 20 cm cable integrates into the rear of the unit with an additional 1.8 m extension cable supplied. - Powered by battery, USB or AC adapter (not included). - Battery life is 5+ hours (depending upon volume). - Easily attaches to backpacks using the carabineer supplied. - Light and portable; perfect for music on the move.
name: Targus Mobile Tunes Portable Speakers

description-en_US-print: Immerse yourself in the game with adrenaline-pumping surround sound. The X-540 speakers use FDD2™ (Frequency Directed Dual Driver) technology to produce a uniform soundfield anywhere in the room. Immerse yourself in the game using the selectable 'matrix mode,' which automatically creates 5.1 surround sound from common 2-channel stereo sources. The compact satellites are wall-mountable, and and a special clip lets you place the centre channel speaker on top of most flat-panel monitors to reduce desktop clutter. Use the wired control centre to control volume and bass levels or connect headphones to enjoy your games and music privately. Frequency Directed Dual Driver technology FDD2 eliminates uneven response created by conventional dual-driver designs. Matrix mode Creates 5.1 surround-sound effect from 2-channel stereo sources. Innovative centre channel LCD clip Speaker attaches to the top of most flat-panel monitors. Satellite speaker stands Rotate for easy wall-mounting and positioning. Dynamic, real-time bass equalisation Maximises low-frequency response at all volumes. High-excursion, ported, down-firing subwoofer Displaces more air for deeper bass.
name: Logitech X-540 Speakers

description-en_US-print: The monitor loudspeakers are optional available and can be mounted directly onto the multi media displays. Due to the same design and the same height arise not only a visual but als an acoustical overall impression.
description-de_DE-print: Die optional erhältlichen Monitorlautsprecher können direkt an die Multimediadisplays montiert werden. Durch das gleiche Design und der gleichen Gesamthöhe entsteht nicht nur visuell, sondern auch akustisch ein optimaler Gesamteindruck.
name: NEC PX-42SP3U

description-en_US-print: You run the show Multiple inputs let you connect your PC, game console, iPod®, DVD player, and more. You’re surrounded It envelops you, immersing you in the action—rich, immersive surround sound, even from two-channel stereo sources. Turn it up Fill the room with 75 watts (RMS) of power—and rattle a few windows while you’re at it.
name: Logitech Z506

Compelling sound quality .
Big bass 12 W sound for multimedia enjoyment .

Experience true multimedia :

description-en_US-print: Enjoy your favourite music wherever you like! These portable speakers connect to practically any audio source, whether it’s an MP3 player or notebook – and they’ll impress you with their excellent stereo sound wherever you are, whether at home, out travelling or on the beach. You never have to rely on a mains socket as you can power them from any USB port or use batteries. Plus, a protective shell is included for when you’re out and about – which also doubles as a non-slip stand when using the speakers.
description-de_DE-print: Genießen Sie Ihre Lieblingsmusik, wo immer Sie möchten! Der portable Lautsprecher lässt sich an praktisch jede Soundquelle anschließen, ob MP3-Player oder Notebook, und begeistert an jedem Ort mit exzellentem Stereoklang – ob zu Hause, auf Reisen oder am Strand. Für die Stromversorgung können Sie jeden USB-Anschluss oder Batterien verwenden und sind so nie auf eine Steckdose angewiesen. Für den Transport liegt eine schützende Schale bei, die im Betrieb als rutschfester Ständer dient.
name: Speed-Link VIVAGO

description-en_US-print: Enjoy your favourite music wherever you like! These portable speakers connect to practically any audio source, whether it’s an MP3 player or notebook – and they’ll impress you with their excellent stereo sound wherever you are, whether at home, out travelling or on the beach. You never have to rely on a mains socket as you can power them from any USB port or use batteries. Plus, a protective shell is included for when you’re out and about – which also doubles as a non-slip stand when using the speakers.

description-fr_FR-print: Système audio Sound Cube Un son qui remplit toutes les pièces, tous les lieux. Reconsidérez la stéréo. Le système Sound Cube de TDK Life on Record produit livre un son puissant, multidimensionnel dans un boîtier compact et original, qui fonctionne partout, à l’intérieur comme à l’extérieur. Les deux puissants haut-parleurs coaxiaux produisent un son qui emplit la pièce dans un format audacieux et unique. L’égaliseur innovant affiche les pulsations de votre musique tandis que les molette de réglage en aluminium vous permettent de contrôler la source musicale, le volume et la tonalité. Les données numériques streaming permettent e décodage et la lecture audio de haute qualite pendant le chargement Apple iPod et iPhone. Ses entrées incluent un port USB, un port 3,5 mm et un port auxiliaire permettant de connecter un iPod, un iPhone, un smartphone ou une clé USB. Vous pouvez même brancher votre guitare et votre micro et les mixer avec d’autres sources musicales. - Deux puissants 5 1⁄4-inch conducteurs coaxiaux offrir une gamme complète du son - Ecouter la musique de votre iPod / iPhone pendant le chargement à l’aide du cable USB Apple a 30 broches - Utilisation de la molette rotative et faire face a l’écran, jouer de la musique et de contrôle directement à partir de périphériques de stockage y compris les clés USB et disques durs externesSon format compact et sa poignée vous permettent d’emporter votre musique partout - Les différentes entrées vous permettent de connecter la plupart des équipements audio et de mixer deux source audio COMPREND: Sound Cube, alimentation secteur et câble USB 30 broches d’Apple.
description-en_US-print: Sound Cube Audio System Fill any room, any place, with sound Rethink stereo. The TDK Life on Record Sound Cube provides powerful, multi-dimensional sound in a distinct, compact design that works anywhere, inside or out. Two powerful coaxial drivers deliver space-filling sound in a unique, bold design. An innovative equalizer gives your music a visual heartbeat for all to see, while aluminum dials give you control over the music source, volume and tone. Digital data streaming allows premium audio decoding and playback while charging Apple iPod and iPhone devices. Inputs include USB, 3.5mm and auxiliary ports that let you connect an iPod, iPhone, smartphone or USB flash drive. You can even plug in your guitar or microphone and mix with other music sources. - Two powerful 51⁄4-inch coaxial drivers deliver a full range of sound - Play your iPod/iPhone music while charging using the USB to 30 pin Apple cable - Using the rotary dial and front facing screen, play and control music directly from storage devices including USB flash and external hard drives - Compact design and handle let you take your music anywhere - Input options let you connect most audio devices and mix two audio sources INCLUDES: Sound Cube, AC power supply, and USB to 30 pin Apple cable.
description-de_DE-print: Sound Cube Audiosystem Erfüllen Sie jeden Raum, jeden Ort mit Sound Denken Sie Stereo neu. Der TDK Life on Record Sound Cube erzeugt kraftvollen, multi-dimensionalen Sound in einem individuellen, kompakten Design, das überall funktioniert, drinnen wie draußen. Zwei leistungsstarke Koaxiallautsprecher liefern einen Raum füllenden Klang in einem unverwechselbaren, markanten Design. Ein innovativer Equalizer macht den Rhythmus Ihrer Musik für jeden sichtbar, während Sie über Aluminiumregler die Musikquelle, die Lautstärke und den Ton kontrollieren. Digitale Daten-Streaming ermöglicht Premium-Audio-Dekodierung und Wiedergabe während des Ladevorgangs der Apple iPod und iPhone-Geräte. Zu den Eingängen gehören USB, 3,5 mm und Zusatzanschlüsse, mit denen Sie einen iPod, ein iPhone, ein Smartphone oder ein USB-Flashdrive anschließen können. Sie können sogar Ihre Gitarre oder Ihr Mikrofon anschließen und mit anderen Musikquellen mischen. - Zwei leistungsstarke 5 1⁄4-Inch Koax-lautsprecher liefern eine umfassende Palette der Wirtschaftlichkeit - Spielen Sie Ihren iPod / iPhone Musik während des Ladevorgangs mit den USB-Stift zu 30 Apple Kabel - Navigier mit dem Drehknopf und Frontblende Bildschirm, Spielen Sie Musik direkt von Speichermedien wie USB-Flash-und externe Festplatten - Song/Künstler, Radio, Lautstärke und Bass-/Höhen-Abgleich werden über Drehregler kontrolliert - Mit dem kompakten Design und dem Griff nehmen Sie Ihre Musik überall hin mit - Eingangsoptionen erlauben den Anschluss der meisten Audiogeräte und das Mischen zweier Audioquellen LIEFERUMFANG: Sound Cube, Netzteil und USB-Kabel mit 30-poligem Apple-Stecker.
name: TDK ETP67101BLK

description-en_US-print: Now you have freedom of choice with Philips optional Multimedia Base. The 6G3B11 delivers a powerful 36 watts PMPO stereo sound output and features front firing sound for clear voice reproduction and direct sound, Bass Boost for extra bass enhancement, headphone connector for personal listening, microphone connector for recording and videoconferencing.
name: Philips Multimedia Pedestal f 15-19" Monitors

description-fr_FR-print:
Enceintes légères, idéales pour un PC, un ordinateur portable ou un lecteur mp3
2 canaux, amplificateur numérique, puissance de sortie totale de 5 W, sortie casque
- Couplage possible avec des périphériques multimédia
- Profitez d'une qualité audio exceptionnelle
- Design incliné pour réduire les distorsions

- Lecture multimédia - Ecoutez la radio sur Internet avec un ordinateur portable ou de bureau, ou utilisez un périphérique mp3 pour accéder à votre musique numérique
- Amplificateur numérique - Un son riche et précis pour une lecture fidèle à l'original
- Enceintes multimédia 2 canaux - Puissance de sortie totale de 5 W, idéale pour un ordinateur de bureau, un ordinateur portable ou un lecteur mp3
- Bass Reflex - Blindage magnétique avec enceintes Bass Reflex pleine gamme pour capter les fréquences faibles
- Simplicité d'utilisation - Réglage du volume et bouton marche / arrêt très pratiques, configuration aisée
- Design incliné à 15° vers le haut - Offre un son sans distorsion, haute qualité et plus naturel
description-en_US-print: Stop straining to hear what's on the screen – put it on blast with magnetically-shielded speakers with 46mm drivers housed in bass-reflex design that deliver deep bass. Play what's happening on your computer screen out loud. Forget trying to hear what someone is saying in a YouTube™ clip – just turn up the volume and let the story unfold. Shudder at the thought of going back to your PC's internal speakers after connecting SRS-A3/BLK external speakers and letting the 46mm drivers housed in bass-reflex design deliver full, rich sound with resonating bass. Mix it up by connecting other music devices via the auxiliary input like an iPod®/iPhone® or Android™ phone, or hook-up headphones if you'd like to keep your music to yourself. Good looks A compact design will complement your desktop while the angled front panel will ensure that your favorite music gets where it needs to-your ears. Performance Upgrade from standard PC speakers and make the most of your favorite audio tracks. Ease of use Integrated Volume control and Power switch let you take control while the front-mount headphone jack lets you enjoy your favorite music in private
description-de_DE-print:
Leichte Lautsprecher eignen sich hervorragend für PC, Notebook oder mp3-Player
2-Kanal, Digitalverstärker, Gesamtausgangsleistung von 5 W, Kopfhörer-Ausgang
- Passend zu Multimedia-Geräten
- Freuen Sie sich auf hochwertige Klangqualität
- Schräges Design verhindert Verzerrungen

- Multimedia-Wiedergabe - Hören Sie Internetradio über PC oder Notebook, oder schließen Sie das Gerät an einen mp3-Player an, um Ihre digitale Musikbibliothek zu nutzen.
- HD-Digitalverstärker - Sorgt für satte Klänge und eine originalgetreue Wiedergabe
- 2-Kanal Multimedia-Lautsprecher - Mit einer Gesamtausgangsleistung von 5 W eignet sich das Gerät hervorragend für einen Desktop-PC, Notebook oder mp3-Player
- Bassreflex - Magnetisch abgeschirmt mit Breitband-Bassreflex für niedrige Frequenzen
- Einfache Bedienung - Praktische Schalter für Lautstärke und An-/Abschaltung sowie einfache Einrichtung
- Design mit einer Steigung von 15° - Sorgt für ein natürlicheres Hörerlebnis mit hochwertigem Klang ganz ohne Verzerrungen
name: Sony SRS-A3

description-en_US-print: The Razer Ferox is the definitive audio reference for mobile gamers. With its state of the art expandable resonance chamber, 360° omni-directional sound and its digitally enhanced amplifier efficiency, this pocket-sized speaker system features exceptional audio and powerful bass that belies its size. Take it around in the included carrying case to enjoy a full-bodied sound experience for up to 12 hours wherever you are. 360° Omni-directional Sound for all-round clarity Unlike forward-facing speakers that only send sound in one direction, the Razer Ferox’s drivers are strategically positioned to produce a phenomenal omnidirectional soundstage that fills your surroundings in every direction evenly and completely. Expanded Bass Resonance Chamber for powerful bass Replicating a subwoofer’s resonance with auto-expanding resonance chambers, the Razer Ferox guarantees strong bass despite its diminutive size, while its distinctive driver construction ensures rich acoustics for an immersive sound stage. Optimized Digital Amplification for exceptional audio quality Experience crystal-clear audio with lower distortion levels thanks to the Razer Ferox’s digital amplification that enhances its power efficiency substantially. Enjoy loud and clear audio on the go with true-to-life quality acoustics.
name: Razer Ferox

description-en_US-print: Loud and clear! CENTER STAGE is everything a home party organizer, musician, small band, or venue needs to deliver big, powerful sound to any audience. This complete sound system consists of two self-powered speakers with stands, a built-in mixer, microphone, cables, a cradle for portable digital players like the iPod and all of the necessary accessories to make the system work. The easy-to-transport speakers output full, rich sound thank to the system's 50 watts of power. You can plug microphones, guitars and other instruments, and iPod or other music players into CENTER STAGE's inputs. CENTER STAGE comes with an 1/8"-to-RCA cable so you can easily plug in your iPod, cell phone, or CD player. Features: - Everything you need for great sound anywhere. - Powered, 50W full-range speakers with built-in mixer. - Speaker stands, cables, and microphone included. - Mic, guitar, instruments, and iPod plug right into the speaker. - Includes cable for iPod or other music players.
name: ION Center Stage

description-en_US-print:
SB-100 SOUNDBAR WITH 3 DIMENSIONAL SOUND TECHNOLOGY

- 3D Sound effects
- 1 x center tweeter
- 1 x 20W subwoofer
- 6 x 10W satelite speakers
- 1 x AUX input

- Compatible with MP3 , DVD player, TV, PC & game consoles
Include

description-de_DE-print: - Soundbar mit dreidimensionaler Raum klang-Technologie - 3D Soundeffekte - 1 x Center Hochtöner - 1 x 20 Watt Subwoofer - 6 x 10 Watt Satellitenlautsprecher - 1 x AUX eingänge - 2 x Line eingänge - Abspielmoeglichkeit u.a. fuer MP3, DVD-Spieler, TV, Computer und Spielkonsolen inklusive - Fernbedienung - 3,5 mm Audiokabel
name: Lenco SB-100 loudspeaker

description-en_US-print: This THX-Certified 5.1 system delivers 500 watts (RMS) of theatre-quality sound. Digital and analogue inputs, an easy-to-read-and-stack control console and a wireless remote let you take charge of your entertainment.
name: Logitech Z906

description-fr_FR-print: Amplification dynamique des basses pour des basses profondes et riches Technologie innovante, l'amplification dynamique des basses accentue les tonalités basses de l'ensemble de la plage de volume, et ce, sur simple pression d'une touche, pour garantir des basses d'une profondeur et d'une richesse sans précédent, même sur les enceintes les plus compactes. Design léger et portable pour écouter votre musique à tout moment Grâce à leur matériau et leur design durables et ultralégers, vous pouvez transporter les enceintes n'importe où. Avec ces superbes enceintes, emplissez de musique n'importe quelle pièce. Ce superbe système d'enceintes trouvera sa place dans n'importe quelle pièce de votre maison, pour de la musique à l'air libre, plutôt que dans un casque. Amplificateur numérique pour un son sans interférence Ces enceintes disposent d'un amplificateur numérique pour de meilleures performances : profitez de la musique de votre téléphone portable sans les désagréments souvent caractéristiques des interférences de signaux sur les téléphones portables. Pour un plus grand plaisir audio Incredible Surround™ est une technologie audio Philips améliorant remarquablement le son pour une immersion totale. Elle intègre un système de déphasage électronique entre le signal son gauche et le signal son droit puis les mixe, augmentant ainsi la distance virtuelle entre ceux-ci. Cette distance élargi l'effet stéréo et crée une dimension sonore plus naturelle. Grâce à la technologie Incredible Surround™, votre téléviseur restitue un son Surround plus profond et puissant, sans haut-parleurs supplémentaires. Prise universelle : fonctionne avec la prise casque 3,5 mm de vos appareils Branchez l'enceinte et profitez de votre musique à partir de n'importe quel appareil doté d'une prise casque 3,5 mm : iPod, iPhone, GoGear, lecteur MP3, ordinateur portable, netbook, téléphone portable MP3, et bien d'autres encore. Donnez à votre musique un son stéréo somptueux. Ce système d'enceintes haute fidélité est équipé d'un amplificateur de classe D, de tweeters et de caissons de basses doubles, pour des aigus cristallins et des basses profondes, créant un son stéréo somptueux. Support intégré pliable pour diriger le son Lorsque vous écoutez de la musique à plein volume au cours de vos déplacements, vous pouvez caler l'enceinte grâce à son support intégré pliable afin de diriger le son en toute simplicité. La technologie de protection contre les interférences des téléphones portables vous offre un son sans parasites. La technologie de protection contre les interférences des téléphones portables est une conception avancée du circuit électronique qui élimine les interférences des téléphones portables pour vous garantir un son sans parasites. Gestion des câbles intégrée des éléments bien rangés La gestion des câbles intégrée signifie que les câbles peuvent être rangés sur le produit pour ne rien perdre ni rien endommager lors des déplacements ou du stockage.
description-en_US-print: Dynamic bass boost - hear the deepest, richest bass Innovative technology delivers unbelievably deep, rich bass from compact speakers. Dynamic bass boost emphasises the bass content of the music throughout the range of volume settings from low to high – at the touch of a button! Lightweight, portable design for music enjoyment any time The durable, lightweight material and design mean you can carry the speakers with you wherever you go. Attractive speakers fill any room with your music The attractive speaker system looks great in any room of your house so you can enjoy your music out loud instead of on your headphones. Digital amplifier for interference-free sound For improved sound performance, these speakers feature a digital amplifier so you can enjoy the sound from your music phone while minimising the disturbance often caused by mobile phone signal interference. Incredible Surround™ for enhanced audio enjoyment Incredible Surround is an audio technology from Philips that dramatically magnifies the sound field to immerse you in the audio. Using state-of-the-art electronic phase shifting, Incredible Surround mixes sounds from left and right in such a way that it expands the virtual distance between the two speakers. This wider spread greatly enhances the stereo effect and creates a more natural sound dimension. Incredible Surround allows you to experience total surround with greater depth and width of sound, without the use of additional speakers. Universal: works via your device's 3.5 mm headphone jack Plug and play with any of your mobile devices that have a 3.5 mm headphone jack – iPods, iPhones, GoGears, MP3 players, laptops, netbooks, music phones and more. Listen to your music in luxurious stereo sound The high-fidelity speaker system features a Class D amplifier, dual woofers and tweeters for rich bass and clear treble so you can enjoy your music in luxurious stereo sound. Built-in folding stand to direct the sound When enjoying your music out loud and on the go, you can easily prop up the speaker to direct the sound with the speaker's convenient, built-in folding stand. Mobile phone shielding technology for static-free sound Mobile phone shielding technology is an advanced circuitry design that cuts out mobile phone interference to ensure static free sound Integrated cable management keeps things neat and organised Integrated cable management means the product is designed to hold the cords to keep everything neat and organised for travel or storage.
description-de_DE-print: Dieser tragbare Lautsprecher bietet erstklassigen Stereosound und ist gegen Störungen durch Mobiltelefone abgeschirmt. Dank des integrierten Kabels können Sie ihn ganz leicht an mobile Geräte anschließen, und der Akku ermöglicht 8 Stunden Wiedergabe ohne Unterbrechung.
description-de_DE-mobile: Erstklassiger Stereosound auch unterwegs den ganzen Tag
name: Philips SBA3020

description-en_US-print:
- Stylish 2.1 speaker set including design subwoofer with convenient touch control at the front and a total RMS power output of 30 Watt (60 Watt peak power)
- Sensitive and easy to use touch control to adjust volume, treble and bass
- Attractive looking subwoofer with illuminated edges in 3 colours to indicate volume, treble or bass control mode
- Powerful subwoofer for a deep and solid bass to boost your music and gaming experience
- Compact, space saving satellite design for clear mid and high range audio response
- 3.5 mm headphone connection and power switch at the back of the subwoofer.
name: Trust XpertTouch 2.1 Speaker Set

description-en_US-print:
- Integrated Stowaway Cradle: Slide out to charge, sync or play your digital music player.
- Control Pod: Keep volume, power and your headphone jack at your fingertips.
- Stereo Headphone Jack: Enjoy your music privately whenever you want.
name: Logitech X-240 2.1

description-fr_FR-print: Design léger, conçu pour être fixé Le haut-parleur s'attache solidement à la plupart des ordinateurs portables et netbooks et les accompagne vers toutes leurs destinations, qu'il s'agisse de vos genoux, de votre lit ou de la terrasse. Son stéréo Plongez-vous dans un son stéréo riche et ample, qu'il provienne de votre collection musicale, de vos films, de vos appels vidéo ou de tout contenu multimédia auquel vous accédez avec votre ordinateur portable. Connexion USB prête à l'emploi Un seul et même câble assure la mise sous tension et fournit un son numérique pur, sans logiciel ou alimentation externe. Etui de transport Votre haut-parleur reste protégé à l'intérieur de votre sac ou de votre porte-documents
description-en_US-print: Lightweight, clip-on design It attaches securely to most laptops and netbooks, so you can easily use it anywhere you use your computer—your lap, your bed, the patio and more. Stereo sound You can immerse yourself in rich, full stereo sound for your music, movies, video calls and everything else you’re enjoying on your laptop. Plug-and-play, USB connection A single cord delivers power and pure, digital audio—without the need for software or an external power supply. Carrying case Your speaker stays protected while inside your bag or briefcase.
name: Logitech Z205

description-en_US-print: The Lenovo Mini Speakers M220 (55Y2033 - Worldwide, except Japan, 57Y6613 - Japan) provides portable shape and quality performance for all your computer entertainment. Ultra-portable with USB power supply which means compatible with laptop. Stylish design and exquisite tone that bring perfect experience for you. Benefits include: - 2.0 Speaker system design - Two speakers (satellites) with one watt per speaker (satellite); two watts of total output - Primary speaker: USB and audio cable - Secondary speaker: Audio cable attaches to the primary speaker - Built-in active amplifier - 200 Hz ~ 19 KHz frequency response for midrange (voice) and high (treble) sound range - 80 dB signal-noise ratio - Attach using one USB 2.0 cable for power, and audio cable from primary speaker - Secondary speaker audio cable attaches to the primary speaker
description-en_US-mobile: M220, Mini speakers 2.0, 200 Hz-19 KHz, USB 2.0, for laptops
name: Lenovo M220
